text:
Džej Ramadanovski (; 29 April 1964 – 6 December 2020) was a Serbian pop-folk singer. He was known for his ballads. Ramadanovski was born in Belgrade. Džej made cameo appearances in movies "Hajde da se volimo 2" (1989) and "Vikend sa ćaletom" (2020). With songs such as "Nedelja" (1991), "Sunce ljubavi" (1995) and "Upalite za mnom sveće" (1996) he became one of the biggest regional artists in the 1990s.
Ramadanovski died in Belgrade of a heart attack on 6 December 2020 at the age of 56.
